body:
Once uppon a time i played a game, and we played on the forum this game... The 3 words game...


Rules

- It starts with: "once uppon a time" (ofcourse 4 words, but its ussually a dutch game which would originally be:"er was eens")

- Then another player types just 3 words that follow up (it has to be a good sentence or it will be denied)

- Never less or more then 3 words

- And so it goes on

- You may not reply on yourself

- And ofcourse the rules of the forums itself!

Example

tdtd27:"Once uppon a time".

tdtd29:"there was a".

tdtd25:"boy who didnt".

And so it goes on...

title: The 3 Word Game
